title: UXApplication
description: Application-level UX configuration that groups UXSpecs and defines shared settings

channel.description: Primary delivery channel this application targets. Multi-channel products use one UXApplication per channel, each referencing channel-specific UXSpecs.

experiences.description: List of UXSpec specNodeIds that comprise the user experiences of this application.

theme.description: Design token theme identifier applied application-wide (e.g., 'brand-light', 'brand-dark', 'high-contrast').

designSystem.description: Identifier of the design system or UXLibrary this application uses (e.g., specNodeId of a ux.uxlibrary node).

defaultLocale.description: Default locale for internationalization, as a BCP 47 language tag (e.g., 'en-US', 'fr-FR', 'ja-JP').
